language.description: Adds support for Google Analytics insertion in the global scope or over individual posts by using custom fields.

specs.title: Sitewide code
specs.description:
Paste the Google Analytics invocation code to put at the head tag of the entire website.

If you want to set specific Analytics code on individual posts, just add a custom field, name it google_analytics and paste the invocation code as the value. It will be put in the head instead of the sitewide code.

Note: the code will be inserted only on the Home, Main and Popup layouts of the templates.
